00055 class DWFEmbeddedFontVisitor _DWFTK_EXPORT_API_MEMORY_CONTROL_BASE

00069 
00077     _DWFTK_API
00078     virtual void visitEmbeddedFont( const DWFEmbeddedFont& rFont )
00079         throw( DWFException )
00080     {
00081         if (_pComposite)
00082         {
00083             _pComposite->visitEmbeddedFont( rFont );
00084         }
00085     }

00098         throw()

00100     {;}
